name: e621 The Game: Tag Your It
name_original: e621 The Game: Tag Your It
description:
How the game works is simple, you're shown a censored image from e621, and then try to guess what tags it has. Then you will be shown what everyone else wrote, and then the actual tags for the image, then everyone votes for what they think the real tags for the image is. You get points for however many tags you get correct, and how many people vote for your tags, whoever has the most point at the end of the game wins.

This can play up to 5 players, and you can blacklist tags and choose what rating the images are. More is explained in-game by clicking on the question mark in the main menu. Room names are case-sensitive.
